original_text: Nobody has ever seen God. But God's only Son has shown God to us. He is very near to the Father, and he himself is God.
korean_text: 본래 하나님을 본 사람이 없으되 아버지 품 속에 있는 독생하신 하나님이 나타내셨느니라

sentences.original_text: But God's only Son has shown God to us
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님의 외아들이 우리에게 하나님을 보여주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He is very near to the Father
